alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 6:50AM EST until December 19 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sacandaga River at Hope. * WHEN...From this morning to late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Water floods NY Route 30 near the Hope town garage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 AM EST Monday the stage was 6.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 7.9 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Sacandaga River Hope Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Mon 6 am: 6.4 Forecast: Mon 7 am 6.5 Mon 1 pm 7.5 Mon 7 pm 7.9 Tue 1 am 7.6 Tue 7 am 7.4 Tue 1 pm 7.1 Tue 7 pm 6.8 Wed 1 am 6.6 Wed 7 am 6.2 Wed 1 pm 5.9 Wed 7 pm 5.7 Thu 1 am 5.4 &&
